text: @WHO @mvankerkhove #askwho how do we know the difference between a common cold/flu and coronavirus? Symptoms seem similar. Considering its flu season and we don't know if Italy has exported many cases, the EU can't test everyone that sneezes

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Italy records first coronavirus death after a spike in cases
entity.description: According to Italian media, a person has died after at least 14 people in the region of Lombardy and two in the nearby region of Veneto were confirmed to be infected with the virus.
